channel.title: Pages on Simon Jürgensmeyer
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Simon Jürgensmeyer

item.author: Simon.Juergensmeyer@gmail.com (Simon Jürgensmeyer)
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Simon, a passionate software developer from Germany. I love programming (especially with Go), playing with Unix-like operating systems, and the open-source spirit. Besides the technical skills, social skills, such as a friendly communication and the ability to empathize with other people, have the same importance to me. Curriculum Vitae University Mar. 2016 - Jan. 2018 Rhein-Waal University of Applied Sciences Information Engineering & Computer Science
